content: The Frostsprout Twig Curios item in Black Myth: Wukong can be found within Chapter 3 of the game. While well-hidden, you will want to pick this up as it is locked behind a secret boss that will open additional areas in the Pagoda Realm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Frostsprout_Twig.md', within the main section titled 'Frostsprout Twig'.
The content is as follows:
The Frostsprout Twig Curios item in Black Myth: Wukong can be found within Chapter 3 of the game. While well-hidden, you will want to pick this up as it is locked behind a secret boss that will open additional areas in the Pagoda Realm.
